alert.note: Alert for Cooke; Grayson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 04 at 8:46PM CDT until May 04 at 9:30PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Cooke County in north central Texas... Southwestern Grayson County in north central Texas... * Until 930 PM CDT. * At 845 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Callisburg, or 7 miles west of Whitesboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Sherman, Gainesville, Whitesboro, Denison, Pottsboro, Collinsville, Gunter, Callisburg, Knollwood, Dorchester, Lake Kiowa, Eisenhower State Park, Randell Lake, Lake Texoma, Southmayd, Tioga, Sadler, Walnut Bend, Locust and Sandusky. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 491 and 499. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 900 PM CDT for north central Texas. For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
